thread.section_title: Hotel Royal Saint Michel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great hotel in the eclectic heart of Paris
thread.title_full: Great hotel in the eclectic heart of Paris - Review of Hotel Royal Saint Michel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: sallylN8056AN
title: Great hotel in the eclectic heart of Paris
text: Close to Metro, St Germaine, Notre Dame and the Latin Quarter, hotel exceeded our expectations. Great value, friendly staff who spoke excellent English. Overall, the location and comfort of the hotel were the best features.
